full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHE BA DZANG DZUNG WANG GI DGE BSGOS, ,TZAS SANG NANG @013B SO CHOS 'PHEL ZHES BYA BAS, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I MDZAD PA BZLOG BSGYUR SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE LAS CUNG RGYAS PA ZHIG BGYIS ZHES BSKUL BA LA NGO MA LDOG PAR, DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BGYIS PA'I NYES TSOGS KUN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA BYAMS SHING BZOD PAR GSOL, ,ZHUS DAG ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN ,
